headline.main: German Eurosceptic Leader Says Infighting Won't Rip Party Apart
headline.print_headline: German Eurosceptic Leader Says Infighting Won't Rip Party Apart

docs.snippet: The founder of the Eurosceptic Alternative for Germany (AfD) has dismissed reports that an identity struggle between economic liberals and right-wingers is tearing the party apart....
docs.lead_paragraph: The founder of the Eurosceptic Alternative for Germany (AfD) has dismissed reports that an identity struggle between economic liberals and right-wingers is tearing the party apart.

headline.main: Defense Moves Into Spotlight in Boston Marathon Bombing Trial
headline.print_headline: Defense Moves Into Spotlight in Boston Marathon Bombing Trial

docs.snippet: The Boston Marathon bombing trial shifts sharply in tone next week when prosecutors rest their case against Dzhokhar Tsarnaev and turn proceedings over to his lawyers, who have already admitted he planted explosives at the finish line in April 201...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Boston Marathon bombing trial shifts sharply in tone next week when prosecutors rest their case against Dzhokhar Tsarnaev and turn proceedings over to his lawyers, who have already admitted he planted explosives at the finish line in April 2013.

headline.main: US State Dept: Difficult Work Remains on Iran Nuke Talks
headline.print_headline: US State Dept: Difficult Work Remains on Iran Nuke Talks

docs.snippet: Negotiations over Iran's nuclear program grew frantic on Saturday amid signs of discord, with the French and German foreign ministers joining U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry in talks with Tehran's top diplomat ahead of an end-of-March deadline ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Negotiations over Iran's nuclear program grew frantic on Saturday amid signs of discord, with the French and German foreign ministers joining U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry in talks with Tehran's top diplomat ahead of an end-of-March deadline for a preliminary deal.

headline.main: Another Polling Station Bomb Explodes in Eastern Nigeria
headline.print_headline: Another Polling Station Bomb Explodes in Eastern Nigeria

docs.snippet: A bomb exploded in the eastern Nigerian city of Enugu at a polling station in a primary school on Saturday, hours before polls opened and before another bomb that stuck a different part of the east, police said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A bomb exploded in the eastern Nigerian city of Enugu at a polling station in a primary school on Saturday, hours before polls opened and before another bomb that stuck a different part of the east, police said.

headline.main: President Urges Yemeni Army to Obey Legitimate Leadership
headline.print_headline: President Urges Yemeni Army to Obey Legitimate Leadership

docs.snippet: Yemeni President Abd-Rabbu Mansour Hadi called on the army on Saturday to protect state institutions and carry out the orders of the "legitimate leadership" as a Arab military campaign against his Houthi militia enemies continued....
docs.lead_paragraph: Yemeni President Abd-Rabbu Mansour Hadi called on the army on Saturday to protect state institutions and carry out the orders of the "legitimate leadership" as a Arab military campaign against his Houthi militia enemies continued.

headline.main: The Longest Ride: Scene Stealer Scott (Featurette)

docs.snippet: Ira and Ruth, Luke and Sophia - two couples separated by time and age - have little in common until a series of unexpected events are set in motion and their lives become intertwined....
